effect.x_y: Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves for the rest of the turn. Unlike other blocking moves, this move may be used consecutively without its chance of success falling.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves for the rest of the turn. Unlike other blocking moves, this move may be used consecutively without its chance of success falling.

short_effect.x_y: Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves.

flavor_text.x_y: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.
